description.part1: We strive to provide the best delivery service for our valued customers. Our shipping partners are carefully selected to ensure your precious jewelry reaches you safely and on time.
description.part2: We offer various delivery options to suit your needs, from standard delivery to express shipping for those urgent occasions.

generalInfo.title: Our Delivery Service
generalInfo.description: We partner with trusted courier services to ensure safe and timely delivery of your valuable purchases. All shipments are fully insured and tracked.

express.title: Express Delivery
express.description: Fast delivery option for urgent orders

domestic.title: Domestic Shipping
domestic.description: We deliver to all major cities and regions within the country. Remote areas may require additional delivery time.

international.title: International Shipping
international.description: We currently ship to select countries. International delivery times may vary depending on customs clearance.

card.title: Credit/Debit Card
card.description: Secure payment using major credit and debit cards

cash.title: Cash on Delivery
cash.description: Pay in cash when your order arrives

online.title: Online Payment
online.description: Various online payment options including PayPal

times.title: Delivery Times
times.description: Our delivery services operate according to the following schedule:
times.holidays: No deliveries on Sundays and public holidays

notes.title: Important Notes
notes.tracking: All shipments include tracking numbers that will be sent to your email
notes.insurance: All deliveries are fully insured against loss or damage
notes.signature: Signature required upon delivery for orders over ₴15000
notes.reschedule: Free delivery rescheduling available if needed

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
